segment.source: Investigate Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection domains
segment.target: Investigate Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection domains

segment.source: Use the investigation options to see if machines and servers have been communicating with malicious domains.
segment.target: Use the investigation options to see if machines and servers have been communicating with malicious domains.

segment.source: Investigate a domain associated with a Windows Defender ATP alert
segment.target: Investigate a domain associated with a Windows Defender ATP alert

segment.source: Applies to:
segment.target: Applies to:

segment.source: Windows 10 Insider Preview Build 14332 or later
segment.target: Windows 10 Insider Preview Build 14332 or later

segment.source: Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection (Windows Defender ATP)
segment.target: Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection (Windows Defender ATP)

segment.source: [Some information relates to pre-released product which may be substantially modified before it's commercially released.
segment.target: [Some information relates to pre-released product which may be substantially modified before it's commercially released.

segment.source: Microsoft makes no warranties, express or implied, with respect to the information provided here.]
segment.target: Microsoft makes no warranties, express or implied, with respect to the information provided here.]

segment.source: Investigate a domain to see if machines and servers in your enterprise network have been communicating with a known malicious domain.
segment.target: Investigate a domain to see if machines and servers in your enterprise network have been communicating with a known malicious domain.

segment.source: You can see information from the following sections in the URL view:
segment.target: You can see information from the following sections in the URL view:

segment.source: URL details
segment.target: URL details

segment.source: URL in organization
segment.target: URL in organization

segment.source: Prevalence in organization
segment.target: Prevalence in organization

segment.source: Communication with URL from organization
segment.target: Communication with URL from organization

segment.source: The URL address details section shows attributes of the URL such as its contacts and nameservers.
segment.target: The URL address details section shows attributes of the URL such as its contacts and nameservers.

segment.source: The URL in organization section provides details on the prevalence of the URL in the organization.
segment.target: The URL in organization section provides details on the prevalence of the URL in the organization.

segment.source: The Communication with URL in organization section provides a chronological view on the events and associated alerts that were observed on the URL.
segment.target: The Communication with URL in organization section provides a chronological view on the events and associated alerts that were observed on the URL.

segment.source: Investigate a domain:
segment.target: Investigate a domain:

segment.source: Select URL from the Search bar drop-down menu.
segment.target: Select URL from the Search bar drop-down menu.

segment.source: Enter the URL in the Search field.
segment.target: Enter the URL in the Search field.

segment.source: Click the search icon or press Enter.
segment.target: Click the search icon or press Enter.

segment.source: Details about the URL are displayed.
segment.target: Details about the URL are displayed.

segment.source: Note: search results will only be returned for URLs observed in communications from machines in the organization.
segment.target: Note: search results will only be returned for URLs observed in communications from machines in the organization.

segment.source: Use the search filters to define the search criteria.
segment.target: Use the search filters to define the search criteria.

segment.source: You can also use the timeline search box to filter the displayed results of all machines in the organization observed communicating with the URL, the file associated with the communication and the last date observed.
segment.target: You can also use the timeline search box to filter the displayed results of all machines in the organization observed communicating with the URL, the file associated with the communication and the last date observed.

segment.source: Clicking any of the machine names will take you to that machine's view, where you can continue investigate reported alerts, behaviors, and events.
segment.target: Clicking any of the machine names will take you to that machine's view, where you can continue investigate reported alerts, behaviors, and events.

segment.target: Investigate a file associated with a Windows Defender ATP alert
